description: Main source file for the NoteEase Flutter application, including models, database helper, main app widget, UI screens for notes listing, detail view, editing, and search functionality.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Data model representing a note with id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt timestamps.

classes.name: NotesDatabase
classes.description: Singleton class managing SQLite database operations for notes, including create, read, update, delete functionalities.

classes.name: NoteEaseApp
classes.description: Root widget defining app theme and home screen.

classes.name: NotesHomeScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget displaying list of notes with search, add, edit, delete, and navigation to detail screens.

classes.name: NoteDetailScreen
classes.description: Stateless widget presenting detailed view of a single note with options to edit or delete.

classes.name: NoteEditScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget for creating or editing a note with form fields.

classes.name: _NotesSearchDelegate
classes.description: Custom search delegate to search and select notes.

methods.name: Note.fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a Note from a Map.

methods.name: Note.toMap
methods.description: Convert Note object to Map for database operations.

methods.name: NotesDatabase.database
methods.description: Getter to initialize and retrieve the database instance.

methods.name: NotesDatabase._initDB
methods.description: Initialize the SQLite database with schema.

methods.name: NotesDatabase._createDB
methods.description: Executes SQL to create notes table.

methods.name: NotesDatabase.createNote
methods.description: Insert a new note into the database.

methods.name: NotesDatabase.readNote
methods.description: Retrieve a note by its ID.

methods.name: NotesDatabase.readAllNotes
methods.description: Retrieve all notes, optionally filtered by a search query.

methods.name: NotesDatabase.updateNote
methods.description: Update an existing note.

methods.name: NotesDatabase.deleteNote
methods.description: Delete a note by its ID.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application, runs the NoteEaseApp.

methods.name: NoteEaseApp.build
methods.description: Builds the MaterialApp with theme and home screen.

methods.name: NotesHomeScreen.initState
methods.description: Initial data load and search controller setup.

methods.name: NotesHomeScreen._loadNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from database with optional search query.

methods.name: NotesHomeScreen._onSearchChanged
methods.description: Handler for search input changes.

methods.name: NotesHomeScreen._onNoteTap
methods.description: Navigate to note detail/edit screen on tap.

methods.name: NotesHomeScreen._onAddPressed
methods.description: Navigate to create new note.

methods.name: NotesHomeScreen._onDeletePressed
methods.description: Delete note and refresh list.

methods.name: NotesHomeScreen._buildNoteCard
methods.description: Build a UI card for a note.

methods.name: NoteDetailScreen._formatDate
methods.description: Format date for display.

methods.name: NoteDetailScreen._onEdit
methods.description: Navigate to edit screen.

methods.name: NoteDetailScreen._onDelete
methods.description: Delete note and go back.

methods.name: NoteEditScreen._onSaveNote
methods.description: Save the note, either creating or updating.

methods.name: _NotesSearchDelegate._buildResultsList
methods.description: Build list of search results.
